resources.string: Are you sure you want to leave the conversation?
All current progress will be lost
Data from chapter %1$d will be deleted
You can go back once you\'ve finished the game.
The chapter will end in a few seconds…
Added you to her friends list
The use of headphones is recommended
Zoe invites you to a conv.
Thanks to those who followed the adventure :)\n More games will be added to Sutoko this year
"Love yourself, because in the darkest parts of your life, you were there when no one else was…"
Press the image to see it
I hesitated for a long time before I wrote you…
I just wanted to tell you that if you need, I\'m always here.
So… Don\'t hesitate, I\'d be happy to be there…
I mean it. I can\'t wait to talk with you…
Go to the bar with Zoe
Zoe has some information to give you
Eva would like to discuss with you
We\'ll figure it out later, okay?

Lucy convinced me to join Yorokobi. This person embodies the mystery but it is not the first time that my judgment is subject to a choice between knowledge and a blind trust.\nSo it wasn\'t long after that I joined her in an unexpected place, the roof of a building that is also unknown to me …

I\'ve decided to refuse to follow Yorokobi. I just didn\'t want to trust Lucy…\nIf the x00\'s program is offered to help someone in need, then when x92 gave it to me?\nMaybe he already knew that Lucy had was hiding something.

I let her lead me to the famous computer room, with the feeling that the stairs would never end. My eyes were lost in these steps, each one redder than the next, and portraits on two parallel brick walls.\nWe were finally getting closer to the information we needed. Yorokobi expects me to use the "gift" of x00 in exchange for the information about Bryan.\nI\'ll remember her, feet together, close to the void. How can such a rational mind be willing to forget its own fears? It would involve lying to oneself.

We were all in danger that day, but believe me, it was nothing compared to the feeling of reliving the same nightmare twice.\nWas Eva in danger? I didn\'t have a second to think, I had to act so as not to regret the mistakes of the choices made under the influence of time.

Yorokobi left me alone to face a horrible discovery.\nI ran to the Belle family house and every time I felt the jolt created by my steps on the ground, my body and heart became heavier. I already knew that this was the end\nOnce again, there was that sense of danger mixed with a wonderful environment. In the darkness even the most beautiful of natural elements can be frightening, but fortunately there are lights that never go out.

Someone was playing with us, I had the feeling that I had been manipulated to get Zoé and me to meet here in front of the lake and the Belle family house.\nThe sky was getting darker and the open door was far from being Lucy\'s signature.\nThe beauty of the sky and the fresh air were mixed with a horrible feeling of horror that no one wanted. It was as if evil mixed with good to make us feel an emotion we never felt before
You\'ve just received 2 messages from Zoe
You were invited into the conversation with Zoe earlier than expected. Lucy is also present
You\'re reading old messages sent to Eva before you\'re finally invited into the conversation…
You decided to leave Zoe alone and go talk to Eva
The evening is coming to an end, but something might upset your moods
After the conversation with Eva, you rush to join Zoe at the bar, something may disturb your state of mind.
The next morning you go to the lake. You meet someone familiar…
Two days later, with Lucy\'s help, you meet Yorokobi on the roof of a building. She tells you this is where it all begins…
You manage to get into the server room with Yorokobi, you\'re close to finding out what Bryan is planning to do
On your way out to join Eva, you notice that Zoe is there, in front of you
You arrive in front of the Belle\'s house, there\'s no one there, everything\'s empty…
You realized the door to the Belle\'s house was wide open…
On the roof of a building
